product_name: The North Face Westing Messenger Bag - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Westing Messenger Bag stashes your 15 in. laptop, U-lock and other gear and keeps it dry as you commute by bike or on foot. Constructed of durable twill fabric with a waterproof coating and features waterproof zippers. Dedicated 15" laptop pocket. Daisy chain U-lock holder. Large main compartment has internal silicone-backed elastic organization for pens, USB thumb drives, etc. 3-point shoulder strap system with removable shoulder pad steadies the bag against your body as you pedal busy streets. The North Face Westing Messenger Bag features a reverse-open flap for easy access to internal pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Westing Messenger Bag stashes your 15 in. laptop, U-lock and other gear and keeps it dry as you commute by bike or on foot.
